Description:
We are seeking a dynamic and enthusiastic Librarian to join our team of educators at our school. The successful candidate will be responsible for managing and developing our primary section library, providing a welcoming and stimulating environment for our students to read and learn.Responsibilities:Develop and maintain an up-to-date library collection of age-appropriate materials for primary students.
Assist students in selecting books and other resources that support their learning.
Conduct library orientation and information literacy sessions for primary students.
Foster a love of reading and literature by organizing reading programs, book clubs, and other library-related activities.
Collaborate with classroom teachers to integrate library resources and services into the primary curriculum.
Manage circulation and overdue notices, as well as repair and replace damaged books and resources.
Participate in professional development opportunities to stay current with library trends and best practices.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Library Science or a related field.
Minimum of 2 years of experience working in a school library setting, preferably with primary students.
Knowledge of children's literature and experience in collection development and management.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work collaboratively with students, teachers, and parents.
Familiarity with library technology and digital resources, including online cataloging and circulation systems.
Passion for working with children and fostering a love of reading and learning.

If you are a dedicated and passionate Primary Section Librarian with a commitment to creating a positive learning environment for students, we encourage you to apply. We offer a competitive salary and benefits package, as well as opportunities for professional development and growth.
